member.name: T:BizTalk.PipelineComponents.XmlCompleteValidator.XmlCompleteValidator
member.summary: XmlValidator Pipeline component to validate an entire XML message against specified Schemas or DTDs and then provide a complete list of the errors found.

member.name: M:BizTalk.PipelineComponents.XmlCompleteValidator.XmlCompleteValidator.Validate(System.Object)
member.summary: The Validate method is called by the BizTalk Editor during the build of a BizTalk project.
member.param: An Object containing the configuration properties.
member.returns: The IEnumerator enables the caller to enumerate through a collection of strings containing error messages. These error messages appear as compiler error messages. To report successful property validation, the method should return an empty enumerator.

member.returns: the copied message instance, if all went well
